name: Seastone Nets
description: Special nets made from Seastone, a rare mineral that emits the same energy as the sea. These nets can neutralize Devil Fruit powers and weaken Devil Fruit users upon contact.

keyMoments.description: Smoker uses Seastone nets to capture Buggy and Alvida, neutralizing their Devil Fruit abilities.

significance: Demonstrates the Marines' use of Seastone technology to combat Devil Fruit users, establishing an important tactical element for future conflicts.
